channel.title: Server bans
channel.description:
Am I the only one to realize what has gone wrong here? Half the server have left because of the downtime, and the other half are banned. We can't help downtime but we can help the harshness of bans. People are being banned for ridiculous amounts of time.
(Anthony) is an example, his ban was 2 months? The people who are banned on this server all go on strict IRC and wait to play other servers, if anything we need to be decreasing the harshness of bans and the amount at this time.
(Anthony) being banned for that long was a huge over reaction. There are literally 4 active players now, this can be increased again if we just give people a second chance, and don't be as harsh.
Suggest: review of all bans, length, and time. A ton of people have been banned without even being posted so that's not gonna do much good.
yes this is a mad rant thread

item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:397228”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=494378.msg3614584#msg3614584 date=1306870949]

Well, a lot of people need unbanning now…

Of the top of my head:

(Anthony) - he didn’t even do anything, you just saw him using it. I think he should have a verbal warning?

i warned him 3 times and mopar i agree

But mopar released a speedhack on moparisthebest? Why should someone be held accountable for using it. It’s just not fair. And the last I remember mopar had a plugin which stops you from moving to fast (Unless he un installed it).
[/quote]

That doesn’t matter, it’s against the rules, and he was caught, that is the bottom line, so he should be punished appropriately.

We never had a plugin to detect speed hacks or flying, I considered one, but it was still in alpha and I didn’t think it was stable enough. I think 1.6 might combat some of this, and I’ll reconsider that plugin when I update the server to 1.6 soon.[/quote]

So you’re keeping him banned for 2 months? Also, I’m sure I remember PMing you about the server disconnecting me once saying ‘you’re moving to fast’? If that wasn’t to combat people moving to fast then I don’t understand what its purpose was.

It was just the one of occasion I believe where it went wrong.

Also, I think we’ve agreed on guidelines? Unless some people haven’t.
